title: Library with fireplace and lounge area, Community access to retail
posting_body: The best of the Northwest, designed for a modern lifestyle.
Pilchuck Village is a new apartment community* in the small town of Arlington, WA.
Minutes from both I-5, and the Centennial Trail.
Live connected to the modern fast paced world, but decompress in small town Washington.
A walk away from shops and dining, as well as Northwest nature.
Want more info on this unit?
This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1167 Sq.
- All units receive good cell reception from the major cell network carriers
- Library with fireplace and lounge area
- Outdoor partially roofed patio with barbecues
- Direct sidewalk access to the Centennial Trail
- Dog park with a potty station, off leash area, and a main leashed section
- Walking distance to convenience stores, grocery store, and Starbucks
- Outdoor fire pit with natural seating
There are a few restrictions by weight, breed and temperament.
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
